contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Fireball Zone | Type = studio | Artist = [[Ric Ocasek]] | Cover = FireballZone.jpg | Released = June 25, 1991 | Recorded = [[Skyline Studios]], [[New York City]] | Genre = [[New Wave Music|New Wave]] | Length = 54:46 | Label = [[Reprise Records|Reprise]] | Producer = [[Ric Ocasek]], [[Nile Rodgers]] | Last album = ''[[This Side of Paradise (Ric Ocasek album)|This Side of Paradise]]''<br />(1986) | This album = '''''Fireball Zone'''''<br />(1991) | Next album = ''[[Quick Change World (Ric Ocasek album)|Quick Change World]]''<br />(1993) }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = [[Allmusic]] | rev1Score = {{Rating|4|5}}<ref>{{cite web |url={{Allmusic|class=album|id=r14341|pure_url=yes}}|title=''Fireball Zone''|author= |publisher=[[Allmusic]] |accessdate=2012-02-16}}</ref> | rev2 = ''[[Rolling Stone]]'' | rev2Score = {{Rating|3|5}}<ref>[http://www.rollingstone.com/artists/ricocasek/albums/album/218361/review/5943518/fireball_zone ]{{dead link|date=February 2012}}</ref> }} '''''Fireball Zone''''' (1991) was the third solo album from [[Ric Ocasek]], the lead singer-songwriter of [[The Cars]]. ==Tracks== All songs written by Ric Ocasek except where noted. #"Rockaway" #"Touch Down Easy" (Ric Ocasek/[[Rick Nowels]]) #"Come Back" #"The Way You Look Tonight" #"All We Need Is Love" #"Over and Over" #"Flowers of Evil" #"They Tried" #"Keep That Dream" #"Balance" #"Mister Meaner" #"Fireball Zone" ==Personnel== *[[Ric Ocasek]] - [[Singing|vocals]], [[guitar]], [[Keyboard instrument|keyboards]] *[[Nile Rodgers]] - Guitar *Larry Mitchell - Guitar *[[Dann Huff]] - Guitar *Steve Elson - [[Horn (instrument)|horns]] *[[Stan Harrison]] - Horns *Matt Collehon - Horns *[[Richard Hilton]] - Keyboards *Al Berry - [[Bass Guitar]] *Larry Aberman - [[Drum kit|drums]] *Tawatha Agee - [[Backing vocalist|backing vocals]] *[[Fonzi Thornton]] - Backing vocals *Curtis King Jr. - Backing vocals *[[Dennis Collins]] - Backing vocals *Katherine Miller - [[Engineer]] *Hiro Ishihara - Engineer *Dave Schiffman - Engineer *Justin Luchter - Engineer *Jon Goldberger - Engineer ==References== {{Reflist}} [[Category:Ric Ocasek albums]] [[Category:1991 albums]] [[Category:Albums produced by Nile Rodgers]] [[Category:Albums produced by Ric Ocasek]] [[Category:Reprise Records albums]] {{1990s-rock-album-stub}}
